sign.caption: You can enter with your E-mail or ID

verificationDesc.selfie: In this task you have to verify yourself.
verificationDesc.business: Take a photo of your business card. This task is an example of document verification.
verificationDesc.yourself: In this task you have to take a photo of some guest who has already logged in to the application and fill the field with his ID.
verificationDesc.event: You have to verify yourself at the meetup and take a photo near the Verifier roll-up.
